segments.advisor_message: Okay, so can you confirm your ownership status of the property? Are you renting or do you own it?
segments.client_message: Uh, I think, uh, I said I owned it, but, I actually rent it, yeah. I rent it from someone.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, renting. And can you tell me the postal code for your address?
segments.client_message: Oh right, uh, it’s actually, um, 12345, I think. Wait, no, sorry, it's 54321, I mixed that up.
